alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Jackson; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HAAKON...NORTH CENTRAL JACKSON AND EASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM MDT... At 341 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Quinn, or 20 miles west of Philip, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Philip, Quinn, and Cottonwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Jackson; Pennington Co Plains
